pkgmetadata.longdescription: Effortless Exception Logging // A very simple and easy-to-use set of suspiciously-familiar functions. 'loggit' provides a set of wrappings for base R's message(), warning(), and stop() functions that maintain identical functionality, but also log the handler message to a 'JSON' log file. While mostly automatic, powerful custom logging is available via these handlers' logging function, loggit(), which is also exported for use. No change in existing code is necessary to use this package.
